svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - March 2 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
March 2, 2024" date: "2024-03-02"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
• Mainnet upgrades to Dencun March 13, epoch 269568, update your nodes MEV-Boost v1.7 : Dencun support
EF mainnet Dencun upgrade announcement Devnet 12 will be deprecated after mainnet upgrades Reminder:
Goerli testnet deprecated , client & EF testing teams will start exiting validators April 17 (3 months
after Goerli was upgraded)
Mainnet upgrades to Dencun March 13, epoch 269568, update your nodes
• MEV-Boost v1.7 : Dencun support
MEV-Boost v1.7 : Dencun support
• EF mainnet Dencun upgrade announcement
EF mainnet Dencun upgrade announcement
• Devnet 12 will be deprecated after mainnet upgrades
Devnet 12 will be deprecated after mainnet upgrades
• Reminder: Goerli testnet deprecated , client & EF testing teams will start exiting validators April
17 (3 months after Goerli was upgraded)
Reminder: Goerli testnet deprecated , client & EF testing teams will start exiting validators April 17
(3 months after Goerli was upgraded)
• Blobs: EF EIP4844 data challenge : write a blob data analysis/viz post by June 14, up to $30k in
prizes Blob usage estimates : 4x growth before blob gas price is greater than 1 gwei
Blobs:
• EF EIP4844 data challenge : write a blob data analysis/viz post by June 14, up to $30k in prizes
EF EIP4844 data challenge : write a blob data analysis/viz post by June 14, up to $30k in prizes
• Blob usage estimates : 4x growth before blob gas price is greater than 1 gwei
Blob usage estimates : 4x growth before blob gas price is greater than 1 gwei
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 )
• Future EOA &Account Abstraction breakout call video . Recap by Tim Beiko and notes by Dom : Align
short term EOA improvements with an agreed account abstraction end game
Future EOA &Account Abstraction breakout call video . Recap by Tim Beiko and notes by Dom :
• Align short term EOA improvements with an agreed account abstraction end game
• Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap & notes from Christine Kim: Retroactive
EIP proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) no expected issues with
Verkle Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) Continued discussion from future EOA breakout
on possible improvements in Pectra Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions on what to include):
EIP7623 (increase calldata cost) EIP5920 (PAY opcode) EIP7609 (transient storage pricing) EIP7639
(stop serving pre-merge history) EIP7642 (drop pre-merge fields) Block confirmation rule engine API &
JSON RPC changes
Latest all core devs – execution (ACDE) call video . Recap & notes from Christine Kim:
• Retroactive EIP proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) no expected
issues with Verkle
Retroactive EIP proposals : EIP7610 (revert contract creation for non-empty storage) no expected
• Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024) Continued discussion from future EOA breakout on
possible improvements in Pectra Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions on what to include):
Pectra upgrade (small fork targeting late 2024)
• Continued discussion from future EOA breakout on possible improvements in Pectra
Continued discussion from future EOA breakout on possible improvements in Pectra
• Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions on what to include): EIP7623 (increase calldata cost)
EIP5920 (PAY opcode) EIP7609 (transient storage pricing) EIP7639 (stop serving pre-merge history)
EIP7642 (drop pre-merge fields)
Potential EIP discussions (but no decisions on what to include):
• EIP7623 (increase calldata cost)
EIP7623 (increase calldata cost)
• EIP5920 (PAY opcode)
EIP5920 (PAY opcode)
• EIP7609 (transient storage pricing)
EIP7609 (transient storage pricing)
• EIP7639 (stop serving pre-merge history)
EIP7639 (stop serving pre-merge history)
• EIP7642 (drop pre-merge fields)
• Block confirmation rule engine API & JSON RPC changes
Block confirmation rule engine API & JSON RPC changes
Osaka upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
• Verkle implementers call video & notes
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.2.2 : hotfix for consensus violation issue on Deneb upgraded networks
Consensus layer:
• Nimbus v24.2.2 : hotfix for consensus violation issue on Deneb upgraded networks
• Execution layer: Geth v1.13.14 : blob pool improvements & blob pool capacity reduced from 10GB to
2.5GB Reth v0.1.0-alpha.21 : fixes live sync critical bug
Execution layer:
• Geth v1.13.14 : blob pool improvements & blob pool capacity reduced from 10GB to 2.5GB
Geth v1.13.14 : blob pool improvements & blob pool capacity reduced from 10GB to 2.5GB
• Reth v0.1.0-alpha.21 : fixes live sync critical bug
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.21 : fixes live sync critical bug
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 31.26% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 31.26% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Geth 72% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Updated assumptions : unknown validators 100% Geth & unaccounted validators 80% Geth Kiln migrated to
50.1% Nethermind Coinbase migrating to 50% Nethermind & plans Erigon support Prysm 37% , any client
bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth 72% supermajority, could cause a chain split Updated assumptions : unknown
validators 100% Geth & unaccounted validators 80% Geth Kiln migrated to 50.1% Nethermind Coinbase
migrating to 50% Nethermind & plans Erigon support
Geth 72% supermajority, could cause a chain split
• Updated assumptions : unknown validators 100% Geth & unaccounted validators 80% Geth
Updated assumptions : unknown validators 100% Geth & unaccounted validators 80% Geth
• Kiln migrated to 50.1% Nethermind
Kiln migrated to 50.1% Nethermind
• Coinbase
Coinbase
• Consensus layer: Prysm 37% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Prysm 37% , any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• Marius Van Der Wijden: optional inclusion lists
ePBS (enshrined Proposer-Builder Separation)
• Side benefits of ePBS : improved pipelining, enhanced incentives for blob inclusion, market &
mechanism flexibility and inclusion list flexibility
Side benefits of ePBS : improved pipelining, enhanced incentives for blob inclusion, market &
• Barnabe: allocate proposing rights rather than building rights
Barnabe: allocate proposing rights rather than building rights
MEV
• MEV research chatbot , requires GitHub or Google login
Research
• Committee-enforced inclusion sets (COMIS) for censorship resistance
Layer 2
• Blast (optimistic rollup) live
Blast (optimistic rollup) live
• Based sequencing: Sequencing & pre confirmations call video and notes : presentations on risks &
concerns RollCall (L2 standards) based sequencing breakout call video Specification for a minimal key
store rollup
Based sequencing:
• Sequencing & pre confirmations call video and notes : presentations on risks & concerns
Sequencing & pre confirmations call video and notes : presentations on risks & concerns
• RollCall (L2 standards) based sequencing breakout call video
RollCall (L2 standards) based sequencing breakout call video
• Specification for a minimal key store rollup
Specification for a minimal key store rollup
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7636 : Extension of EIP778 for "client" ENR entry EIP7637 : EXTCODEHASH optimize EIP7639 :
Cease serving history before PoS EIP7640 : Transaction revert protection EIP7642 : eth/69 - Drop
pre-merge fields EIP7643 : History accumulator for pre-PoS data
EIPs:
• EIP7636 : Extension of EIP778 for "client" ENR entry
EIP7636 : Extension of EIP778 for "client" ENR entry
• EIP7637 : EXTCODEHASH optimize
EIP7637 : EXTCODEHASH optimize
• EIP7639 : Cease serving history before PoS
EIP7639 : Cease serving history before PoS
• EIP7640 : Transaction revert protection
EIP7640 : Transaction revert protection
• EIP7642 : eth/69 - Drop pre-merge fields
EIP7642 : eth/69 - Drop pre-merge fields
• EIP7643 : History accumulator for pre-PoS data
EIP7643 : History accumulator for pre-PoS data
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7638 : Optimized calls encoding (for contract wallets) ERC7641 :
Intrinsic rev share token (ERC20 extension) ERC7644 : ERC721 name registry extension
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7638 : Optimized calls encoding (for contract wallets)
ERC7638 : Optimized calls encoding (for contract wallets)
• ERC7641 : Intrinsic rev share token (ERC20 extension)
ERC7641 : Intrinsic rev share token (ERC20 extension)
• ERC7644 : ERC721 name registry extension
ERC7644 : ERC721 name registry extension
Stuff for developers
• Remix v0.44 : save deployed contracts and adds Sindri integration (compute zk proofs remotely)
Remix v0.44 : save deployed contracts and adds Sindri integration (compute zk proofs remotely)
• Foundry: Isolated mode for gas measurement
Foundry:
• Isolated mode for gas measurement
• Base64 library (Solidity): OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.0.2 : fixes Base64 encoding potentially dirty
bytes since v4.50 Solady Base64 : updated to be agnostic to dirty trailing memory bits
Base64 library (Solidity):
• OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.0.2 : fixes Base64 encoding potentially dirty bytes since v4.50
OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.0.2 : fixes Base64 encoding potentially dirty bytes since v4.50
• Solady Base64 : updated to be agnostic to dirty trailing memory bits
Solady Base64 : updated to be agnostic to dirty trailing memory bits
• Vyper: Vyper v0.4.0b1 : import system overhauled, reusable Vyper modules and experimental venom IR
Guide to get started with Vyper modules
Vyper:
• Vyper v0.4.0b1 : import system overhauled, reusable Vyper modules and experimental venom IR
Vyper v0.4.0b1 : import system overhauled, reusable Vyper modules and experimental venom IR
• Guide to get started with Vyper modules
• BALLS : DSL/Huff-preprocessor in Rust to generate optimized assembly
BALLS : DSL/Huff-preprocessor in Rust to generate optimized assembly
• EVM from scratch : guide to create a mini EVM, work in progress
EVM from scratch : guide to create a mini EVM, work in progress
• Slither v0.10.1 : Solidity v0.8.24 & top level event support, new detector: Arbitrum out of order
retryable tickets and limit results with include-paths option
Slither v0.10.1 : Solidity v0.8.24 & top level event support, new detector: Arbitrum out of order
• Guide to using Napalm to manage custom detection modules
Guide to using Napalm to manage custom detection modules
• OpenZeppelin Defender v2 general availability
OpenZeppelin Defender v2 general availability
• EIP4844 blob dev usage guide, how to send blob transactions and query blobs
EIP4844 blob dev usage guide, how to send blob transactions and query blobs
• Mopro-cli : build & test Circom circuits from Rust, MVP
Mopro-cli : build & test Circom circuits from Rust, MVP
• MACI v1.2 : supports non-quadratic voting polls and adds EAS gatekeeper Contribute to MACI v1.2
trusted setup ceremony by March 5
MACI v1.2 : supports non-quadratic voting polls and adds EAS gatekeeper
• Contribute to MACI v1.2 trusted setup ceremony by March 5
Security
• Tornado Cash deposits using IPFS gateways likely have notes exposed & deposit is at risk, warning
blog post may also be a trap
Tornado Cash deposits using IPFS gateways likely have notes exposed & deposit is at risk, warning blog
post may also be a trap
• Seneca $6.4M exploit on mainnet & Arbitrum via arbitrary call, revoke any approvals, 80% of funds
returned
Seneca $6.4M exploit on mainnet & Arbitrum via arbitrary call, revoke any approvals, 80% of funds
• SoK: security vulnerabilities in SNARKs , analysis of 141 implementation vulnerabilities
SoK: security vulnerabilities in SNARKs , analysis of 141 implementation vulnerabilities
Ecosystem
• Blocknative Ethernow : adds live dashboard of transactions & base fee
Enterprise
• HackMD adds Sign-in with Ethereum
Job Listings
• TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
TechOps are looking for DevOps . Work on projects such as MakerDAO.
• ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
ChainSafe seek a Head of Protocol Engineering
• Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
Nethermind: Distributed Systems Dev Lead & Cryptography Researcher
• Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
Sr. Developer Relations Manager & Technical Writer at Powerloom
• Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
Solidity: C++ Software Engineer and Programming Language Researcher
• Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Assistant & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Community Supporter , Production Assistant & Volunteer Coordinator
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.5 to 305.8 gwei, with 46.2 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 22.8 gwei 17.8k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.5 to 305.8 gwei, with 46.2 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 22.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.8 gwei
• 17.8k ETH net burn this week
17.8k ETH net burn this week
• ETHUSD : $2,908 - $3,512, currently $3,453
ETHUSD : $2,908 - $3,512, currently $3,453
• ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
• Ondo global markets : tokens represent rights to securities held by broker-dealers
Ondo global markets : tokens represent rights to securities held by broker-dealers
• Astaria Intents (intent-based lending) live on Base
Astaria Intents (intent-based lending) live on Base
• Arbitrum Arcade : 8 week promotion to try games on Arbitrum, starts March 11
Arbitrum Arcade : 8 week promotion to try games on Arbitrum, starts March 11
Regulation/business/tokens
• Gemini plan to return Earn users assets subject to bankruptcy approval & $37M fine to NY DFS
Gemini plan to return Earn users assets subject to bankruptcy approval & $37M fine to NY DFS
• Fidelity All-in-One ETFs include 1-3% crypto allocation
Fidelity All-in-One ETFs include 1-3% crypto allocation
• Optimism RetroPGF3 learnings & reflections
Optimism RetroPGF3 learnings & reflections
General
• US Whitehouse: use memory safe programming languages
End of service: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-march-2-2024
